# Choose Your PR Template

This repository has multiple PR templates to help you provide the right information. Please close this PR and create a new one using the appropriate template:

## ðŸ‘¥ Maintainer Changes
**Use this template if you're modifying `project-maintainers.csv`**

[Create PR with Maintainer Template](../../compare?template=maintainer_update.md) 

This template includes:
- Required checklist for maintainer changes
- Documentation requirements
- Structured format for describing changes

## ðŸ”§ General Changes  
**Use this template for all other changes (code, docs, workflows, etc.)**

[Create PR with General Template](../../compare?template=general.md)

This template includes:
- Standard change types
- Testing checklist
- General description format

---

## Need Help?

- Review the [workflow documentation](.github/WORKFLOW_SETUP.md) for maintainer PR requirements
- Contact the repository maintainers if you're unsure which template to use

_If you continue with this default template, please delete this section and describe your changes below._
